title: Hindujas may borrow ₹4,000 crore to fund Reliance Capital purchase
description: The group's acquisition of Reliance Capital is pending necessary court and regulatory approvals. Its offer of ₹9,650 crore was approved by the committee of creditors (CoC) in July last year, subject to requisite approvals.
